Mod.name: The Dreamland
Mod.author: AceMenace
Mod.description: !!! Ultra or Maximum graphics and Screen Follow are HIGHLY recommended !!!

fireball.description: For when you really need to get someone outta your face. Packs a punch? Well, it is the punch now! Watch in satisfaction as blood spills from your enemies when you punch them!
fireball.name: Talk-To-The-Hand

flamestrike.name: Fireblast
flamestrike.description: It's hard to aim, but does huge damage. Takes 1 second to grow to full damage, so keep your distance for that heavy damage.

firespray.name: Hazy Dreams
firespray.description: Summon a huge cloud of dreams, which breaks into a barrage of multiple hazy projectiles! Fire close for maximum damage, far for cool graphics!

triplet.name: Lava-In-A-Bottle
triplet.description: Portable lava in a bottle enchanted by runes! Spill it anywhere you want and create instant globs of lava! Small Print: Lava's intensity has been weakened by the runes for safer transporting. Caution: Not microwave-safe.

effects.title: Fast
effects.text: Gain a 100% movement speed bonus for 1 second when casting (even if you miss).

difire.name: Flowing Fire
difire.description: Spray your enemies with a river of fire! Doesn't hurt at first, but has a burning after-taste! Reduced movement speed while spraying.

meteor.description: Fire an enormous missle that slowly moves across the map, pushing aside anything in its way. The missle then leaves a huge trail of smoke behind, maybe a bit too huge though...
meteor.name: Not-So-Tactical Smoke

gravity.name: Gay-Baby-Jail
gravity.description: Hold an enemy in place while you unleash your volleys upon them. Predict where the enemy will go next and mass produce. FYI, For anyone who doesn't know, Gay-Baby-Jail refers to any spot in a game where you are trapped forever and cannot get out, no matter what you do.

whirlwind.name: Violent Storm
whirlwind.description: Conjure a violent storm that moves foward while damaging and slowing enemies down. The storm also catches enemy projectiles.

effects.title: Slow
effects.text: Enemies caught in your Storm will be slowed 35% for 2 seconds.

link.description: Throw out a chain to latch onto enemies and slowly pull them towards you. Use the short cooldown to chain multiple enemies or trap one of them in your grasp!

effects.title: Redirect
effects.text: While chained, 30% of all received damage is instead applied to your enemy.

link.name: Demon Chains

grapple.description: Hold the button to grapple. Move your cursor to swing enemies around. Throw 'em into the void! Now with extra length and a sharper end!
grapple.name: GET OVER HERE!

kamehameha.name: Death Chanter
kamehameha.description: Chant for awhile and then unleash an extremely deadly blast! Flashes bright for effect!

effects.title: Interruptible
effects.text: If you take an enemy hit, Death Chanter will be interrupted.

effects.title: Omae Wa Mou Shindeiru
effects.text: NANI?!

lightning.name: Minigun
lightning.description: Nice 'n classy. Press a button to gun 'em down! You will be able to fire for a REALLY long time, so keep some distance from the danger! Use your mouse to slowly turn your minigun. Does not receive lifesteal.

blast.name: Death Whisperer
blast.description: Hold down the button to charge your blast for longer. Charge for 6 seconds for maximum damage and knockback.

effects.title: Interruptible
effects.text: If you take an enemy hit, Death Whisperer will be interrupted.

homing.description: Shoot a magical orb of demon blood that gets faster over time while following your enemies. Does little damage, but has insane healing effects. Explodes into a cascade of blood to dazzle your enemies!
homing.name: Blood Orb

boomerang.name: Tracer
boomerang.description: Leave a bright trail behind you with a powerful ball of magic. Enemies that touch the ball will take huge damage. Circle around your enemies and force them into death! Note that only the ball does damage, not the trail. Does not receive lifesteal.

retractor.name: Energy Pulsar
retractor.description: Fire a small projectile that slows down over time into a stop. Release the button anytime to instantly make it stop. After stopping, the pulsar will explode after a while. Damage increases over time. Utilize the short cooldown of this spell to carefully but quickly burst down enemies!

backlash.name: Zappyz
backlash.description: Away and back. Hit your enemy twice, if you can. Spam 'em quick!

rocket.name: Glaical Rocket
rocket.description: Fire a slowing moving rocket crafted with the finest freezing magic. Control it with your mouse and click anytime to explode! Freeze-time and area-of-effect increase over time, so circle around your enemies for maximum effect.

effects.title: Interruptible
effects.text: If you take an enemy hit, Glaical Rocket will be interrupted.

effects.title: Freeze
effects.text: Enemies hit will be unable to move for a long time.

whip.name: Knocker
whip.description: Junk in your way? Knock 'em right off the map with a sparkling whip of destruction! Does not deal damage. Tip: Simply consistently fire it for a constant movement speed boost!

effects.title: Fast
effects.text: Gain a 150% movement speed bonus for 1.5 seconds when casting (even if you miss).

bouncer.description: Summon a tiny magical crystal with infinte potential. Push it along its way to an unsuspecting enemy!

effects.title: Anicent Legend
effects.text: When combined, the eleven mythical crystals grant power unlike anything an acolyte has ever known. Unfortunately, since the Great Collapse, the eleventh crystal's location is unknown.

bouncer.name: Mythical Crystal

repeater.description: Every time this hits, the cooldown resets and you can shoot it again immediately. Damage decreases over time while knockback increases, so get into a mid-range to easily hit your enemies while still doing high damage!
repeater.name: Sonic Lightning

drain.description: Fire a lightweight projectile that automatically changes directions when sensing a nearby enemy! After changing directions, speed increases dramatically! With the help of speical runes, this bullet can even detect things that you can't! Unfortunately, the overload of runes has made this spell burn out quickly, so use at mid-range for maximum effect!
drain.name: Re-Fraction

icewall.name: Enchanted Barricade
icewall.description: Spawn small, lightweight walls and build your own barricade! These walls will reflect shots.

horcrux.name: [Not Copyrighted From Harry Potter]
horcrux.description: As long as your Horcrux is alive, you cannot die. The Horcrux will VERY quickly lifesteal from any nearby enemies. The Horcrux will kill enemies.

saber.name: Bastion-Mode
saber.description: Enter Bastion-Mode! Bastion-Mode conjures a movable energy shield that lasts forever! But the spell is so strong that you won't be able to move! Casting other spells will cancel bastion mode.'

dualSaber.name: Tough Layers
dualSaber.description: Harness powerful magic and create barriers around yourself! Build these barriers over time and create a cocoon of pure magic! Ineffective against area-of-effect spells... and lucky shots. You will be slightly slowed. Casting spells, including this spell while it is in cooldown,  will remove all shields.

effects.title: Detach
effects.text: Tough Layers cuts through any Chains or Grapples currently attached to you.

scourge.name: Scourge
scourge.description: Release a melee-range explosion that will send your enemies flying! Does not deal damage. Be careful - this spell is so powerful it costs you some health too. But don't worry, it won't kill you.

effects.title: Heavy
effects.text: While casting Scourge, knockback is reduced by 75%.

shield.name: UNO Reverse Card
shield.description: Reflect away projectile attacks. Ineffective against area-of-effect spells. Time it just right, or simply spam it.

phaseOut.name: Ninja
phaseOut.description: Throw down a smoke bomb and disappear into the night, reappearing after 4 seconds with another smoke bomb. Long distance movements require a lot of energy, so you will be silenced for 3 seconds after the spell ends.

supernova.description: A delayed explosion to knock back your enemies. Knockback is higher at the center of the blast. Make the skies fall with your explosive stones!
supernova.name: Comet Rush

halo.name: Void Blade
halo.description: Harness the power of the void into a dagger! Swing your dagger for some very rewarding damage! The blade has a fixed length, so get close, but not too close.

effects.title: Fast
effects.text: Gain a 100% movement speed boost.

mines.name: Electro-magi-etic Field
mines.description: Generate a field of orbs bound together by powerful, electrical magic! Enemies who try to push the orbs out of their ring will receive a painful punishment! Mines are more clustered in the direction you are facing, so shoot them in the enemy's direction for maximum effect!

iceBomb.name: Blizzard
iceBomb.description: Spray a splatter of frost in a HUGE circle that will circle back after awhile.

effects.title: Freeze
effects.text: Freeze nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

teleport.description: Teleport to a nearby location. Hop around the map like the carefree child you once were.

effects.title: Nostalgia
effects.text: For 1.5 seconds after teleporting, you will deal 150% damage due to the wonderful feeling of nostalgia.

teleport.name: Hoppin

thrust.name: Stardust Dash
thrust.description: Absorb stardust around you into a sphere and dash foward dealing small damage and knockback!

swap.name: Sorry
swap.description: Shoot a light-speed projectile to swap positions with an enemy, obstacle or meteor. Teleports if you miss.

voidRush.name: Naruto-Run
voidRush.description: Naruto-Run for 3 seconds, boosting movement speed 4x, and also become immune to damage from the void.

vanish.name: Shadow Arts
vanish.description: Vanish from sight for 5 seconds, and also run 3x as fast as when you were visible.

armor.name: Fortify
armor.description: Passive ability. Fortify your defenses, reducing the effectiveness of all spells while becoming much heavier.

effects.title: Resistant
effects.text: Reduce damage received by 15%, and resist some knockback. Applies to all forms of damage, including void damage. A not-so-solid shield will cover you.

empower.name: Apex Predator
empower.description: Passive ability. Become the Apex Acolyte and unleash your true potential!

effects.title: Envolved
effects.text: Increase damage dealt by 20%, movement speed by 5%, and resist 5% of all damage! Bear the menacing mark of the hunter.

boost.name: Super Agility
boost.description: Passive ability. Gain a solid speed boost for easier dodging and better jukes. Resist 25% of all void damage.

effects.title: Fast
effects.text: Increase movement speed by 30%. Run so fast that green particles will follow you around.

bump.description: Passive ability. Reverberate sonic waves throughout your body, boosting you forward. Knockback anyone you touch. Makes you slightly heavier.

effects.title: Fast
effects.text: Increase movement speed by 15%. Slightly reduce knockback. Feel the ground tremor around you.

wall.description: Spawn small walls and build your own barricade! These walls will absorb shots.
wall.name: Barricade

smoke.name: Tactical Smoke
smoke.description: Throw a smoke for cover and charge on in!

parasite.name: Parasitic Wurm
parasite.description: Spawn a tamed wurm, who will follow nearby acolytes, in thirst of fresh blood. If they hit an enemy, the cooldown will be reset and you can spawn another wurm instantly. Get in close to quickly unleash a horde these FIERCELY loyal, slithering horrors (no pun intended).

portal.name: Sealed Rift
portal.description: Concentrate your magic energy and rip open a dimensional rift. Enemies that walk into the rift will swap positions with you! Create multiple portals and set them up strategically!

effects.title: Cleanse
effects.text: Clears all positive and negative effects.

toxic.name: Nuclear Bolts
toxic.description: Radioactive energy combined with chemical wastes into a weaponized bullet, along with speed and homing created through enchantment, ta-da! A perfect spammable weapon that slowly kills your enemies while slowing their movement. Does not recieve lifesteal.

booster.name: Neural Hijacker
booster.description: A tiny ball enchanted with heavily-experimental runes. Enemies that tread into its range will move uncontrollably!

insane.name: Blazing Stakes
insane.description: Shoot foward a bunch of flaming stakes in a fan-shaped area that will anchor themselves into the ground. After a set amount of time, these stakes will fly back towards you! The damage increases on the way back.

storm.name: Firestorm
storm.description: Spray a splatter of flames in a HUGE circle that will circle back after awhile.

spread.name: Surge
spread.description: Allow your magic to surge foward as little strands of lightning! These will follow the enemy and constantly pester them! Works well with knockback spells, which force the strands to hit!

stake.name: Magical Stakes
stake.description: Shoot out 5 stakes in a star-shape around you, dealing high damage. These stakes will then continuously fly back towards you and stop after a set amount of time. Damage increases to the stated amount over time.

effects.title: Fast
effects.text: Gain a 100% movement speed bonus for 10 seconds when casting (even if you miss). Speed decays over time. Speed decay is proportional to the remaining duration of the stakes.

purge.name: Toast Himself
purge.description: The great Toast's presence will be with you for 5 seconds, launching almost everything away and creating peace in the battlefield! Ineffective against non-moving projectiles, because Toast is too weak physically to throw them off the map.

charm.description: Shoot a simple projectile that charms your enemies. Charmed enemies will follow you around! Be careful though, sometimes they get a little too intimate and start pushing you around!

effects.title: Blinded by Love
effects.text: While charmed, your lover takes double of all your received damage.

charm.name: Charm

dragon.name: Dragonbreath
dragon.description: Unleash your inner dragon and spew flames! Use your mouse to control the direction!

thisisntmesos.name: Purify
thisisntmesos.description: Rid your body of all toxins and gain a small movement speed buff that will quickly decay.

effects.title: Cleanse
effects.text: Clears all positive and negative effects.

haunt.name: Vortex
haunt.description: Rain down multiple projectiles and create a haunting vortex! Cortrol the vortex with your mouse, but the projectiles will not stray too far from their central point. Speed boosts can help you get the projectiles further away from their central point. Get in close and rain hell upon your enemies!

effects.title: Slow
effects.text: Enemies caught in your Vortex will be slowed 65% for 2 seconds.

combo.name: Laser Machete
combo.description: Swing it back and forth, destroying projectiles and knocking enemies back!

mend.name: Void Mender
mend.description: Enter a complex mending state for 7.5 seconds, concentrating energy and creating a green aura around yourself! Any void damage taken will be converted into health. Any void lifesteal effects that enemies receive will deal damage to them instead! You will absorb all ordinary projectiles. While you are in this state, and for 3 seconds after the spell ends, you cannot cast any spells.

kamikaze.name: Adrenaline Rush
kamikaze.description: Gain a ridiculous movement speed boost for a 10 seconds, but you will take double damage from all sources. Speed quickly decays over time.

ihitthose.name: Sniper
ihitthose.description: Nice 'n classy. Get in position, charge up, boom. Damage greatly increases over time, so hit from accross the map for maximum effect.

train.name: Laser Minigun
train.description: A remake of the beloved Minigun, except this one's playing style is completely different! Fire a long train of laser projectiles that continuously knock enemies back! Perhaps if you hit them at the right angle, they will be pushed right out of existence..?

cable.description: Throw forward two cables, and fly in the direction of any object you grapple! You will fly to the object that was hit first, but if aimed perfectly, you will fly in between the two objects! Spread your cables and fly!
cable.name: Flying Cables

assassin.name: Assassin's Instinct
assassin.description: Passive ability. Hide from enemies and become 'almost' invisible. A little dust trail will follow you around. You will take increased damage while in this state. Don't get TOO greedy with invisibility though, using Shadow Arts or Ninja will CANCEL this effect.

effects.title: Distracted
effects.text: Being too focused on killing the enemy causes you take 25% more damage.

effects.title: Fast
effects.text: For 1.5 seconds after warping, you will gain a 50% movement speed boost that will decay.

knock.name: Swarm
knock.description: Engulf your enemies in a sea of void. Control the swarm with your mouse! Movement speed will be reduced.

time.name: Particle Accelerator
time.description: Contain an enormous amount of energy into a small ball. The ball will collapse after a few seconds, sending particles skyrocketing towards your enemies!

firebomb.description: Fire off a volley of bombs, which will explode and deal damage! Try to hit all of them!
firebomb.name: Firebomb

nuke.description: Launch the ultimate weapon! Deals huge damage but with a large delay before the explosion!
nuke.name: Nuke

epictime.name: Bloom
epictime.description: Wield the power of spring and summon multiple projectiles that will twirl around you! After some time, these projectiles will shoot back towards you and bounce off. Then the projectiles will start twirling around you again after a set amount of time.

missile.name: Missile Barrage
missile.description: Enter assault-mode and launch a total of 10 missiles over time! Aim with your mouse! Movement speed will be reduced.

turrent.name: Turret
turrent.description: Setup a turret where you are standing! The turret will first slowly scan nearby enemies and then automatically fire at them! The more damage your turrent takes, the less bullets it will fire. There must be at least one nearby enemy during the turret's scanning mode in order to proceed to the firing mode.

failedhelix#3.name: Lost Souls
failedhelix#3.description: A pair of lovers, whose lost souls wander the endless battlefield, just hoping to be with one another again. If one of these souls happen to come upon you, you will collapse from a sudden, unbearable feeling of loss and sorrow.

parasite2.name: Outbreak
parasite2.description: WARNING. SECTOR 13 OUTBREAK. RESEARCH FACILITY FOR {UNTAMED WURMS}. EVACUATE IMMEDIATELY.

backward.name: Razor
backward.description: Summon your sharp swords and prepare dance with the enemy! Spin around to slice through projectiles and acolytes alike! Take en garde to a whole new level.

wave.name: Wave
wave.description: Summon a wave and ride it as it carries you forward. Push aside the waters and sweep enemies away!

effects.title: Might of the Sea
effects.text: Waves : Blade of the Sea : Cyclone : Wrath of the Sea

ring.name: Blade of the Seas
ring.description: Brandish the blades of the sea and slice through enemy crowds! Upon missing an enemy, these blades will circle around you, closer and closer, until they are returned to you.

effects.title: Might of the Sea
effects.text: Waves : Blade of the Sea : Cyclone : Wrath of the Sea

drone.name: Bomber
drone.description: Call in for an air-strike. Watch out for the menacing shadows of these silent bombers.

betapi.name: {Project P.I.}
betapi.description: A super boost in all stats from an experimental serum, perfect for a small, quick burst! Doesn't last long, so get your moves planned out before you use the serum.

effects.title: Hidden Easter Egg
effects.text: I mean, what?

whip2.description: Summon a quick bolt of lightning somewhere near your mouse! You won't be able to shoot enemies too close to you, so keep your distance. Spam 'em quick!
whip2.name: Shocker

tides.name: Cyclone
tides.description: Summon a mighty cyclone, with sharp shards of water that will zoom back and forth in a circular pattern, smashing into enemies! After a while, the cyclone's pull will weaken and send the water shards flying everywhere!

effects.title: Might of the Sea
effects.text: Waves : Blade of the Sea : Cyclone : Wrath of the Sea

dsuperrailgun.name: The-Super Railgun
dsuperrailgun.description: Charge up for a while and shoot a powerful projectile to obliterate enemies!

effects.title: Interruptible
effects.text: If you take an enemy hit, The-Super Railgun will be interrupted.

effects.title: The-Super. D-Super.
effects.text: Ba dum tss!

autosaveyoudidthistome.name: Wrath of the Sea
autosaveyoudidthistome.description: The very fabric of the sea is in your hands. Make the world tremble before you.

effects.title: Might of the Sea
effects.text: A warding kit capable of dealing high burst damage.

effects.title: Might of the Sea
effects.text: Waves : Blade of the Sea : Cyclone : Wrath of the Sea

aircutter.name: Air Cutter
aircutter.description: Summon a nasty gust that will leave deep cuts in your enemies! Penetrates all enemies. Enemies hit will get picked up by the wind and will lose their balance!

effects.title: Oncoming Storm
effects.text: Air Cutter : [Coming Soon] : [Coming Soon] : [Coming Soon]
